title: Check this out yo! 3 days into 2020 ðŸ¥°
body:
Message I got : 

https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/449297302587441152/663495411356401684/Annotation_2020-01-05_133303.png

I lost my promos and received an unfriendly message.

Weeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee Roller Coaster ride game

Not mad that I lost the game but I'm just ultra disappointed by his/her messages :(

replies.body:
I go into rank games and mute all so I don't see messages in-game. I know you're REALLY confused. I didn't add him after him expressing his judgment, it's vice versa. Just because I added him as friend, it doesn't necessarily make me encouraging his thoughts.

 "I disapprove of what you say, but I will defend to the death your right to say it" - Voltaire

What does the date have to do with anything?

Why are you accepting friend requests from these people?
I accept all. (I have in game chat/pings muted)
I say, submit a ticket to Riot and get this bish account banned. Please, for the good of us all.

I have to ask. Milk Tea Lover and Infamous Monkeys? You really do accept friend requests from anyone, don't you?   

*(considers adding you)*
{{sticker:sg-jinx}}

Yep, British humor. Don't panic.

> [{quoted}](name=Nightsky Pirate,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=wmJEHc1M,comment-id=000200000000,timestamp=2020-01-06T06:21:19.945+0000)
>
> I have to ask. Milk Tea Lover and Infamous Monkeys? You really do accept friend requests from anyone, don't you?   
> 
> *(considers adding you)*
> {{sticker:sg-jinx}}
> 
> Yep, British humor. Don't panic.

As agreed right?
1.5 months.

> [{quoted}](name=Nightsky Pirate,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=wmJEHc1M,comment-id=000200000000,timestamp=2020-01-06T06:21:19.945+0000)
>
> I have to ask. Milk Tea Lover and Infamous Monkeys? You really do accept friend requests from anyone, don't you?   
> 
> *(considers adding you)*
> {{sticker:sg-jinx}}
> 
> Yep, British humor. Don't panic.

sorry to bother.
if i truly bring my side.
will you honor your side?
were you serious?
Yes, absolutely. I didn't think about servers so I'll have to make an EUW account if I can figure it out.

> [{quoted}](name=Nightsky Pirate,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=wmJEHc1M,comment-id=00020000000000000000,timestamp=2020-01-06T21:07:55.844+0000)
>
> Yes, absolutely. I didn't think about servers so I'll have to make an EUW account if I can figure it out.

Ok i will be in contact.
i am logging off the boards now
Hehe I just join my friend's club.
I wish I was important enough for people to do that to me :(
